meanings.definition: Capable of being regained or recovered.
meanings.sent1: The lost toy was easily retrievable from under the bed.
meanings.sent2: The information stored in the cloud is retrievable at any time.
meanings.sent3: It was like a magic trick - the disappearing coin suddenly became retrievable!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a retrievable treasure, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The key to his success was his retrievable memory, never forgetting important details.

meanings.definition: Able to be accessed or obtained again.
meanings.sent1: The deleted file was retrievable with the help of a backup.
meanings.sent2: The library books are retrievable for another two weeks.
meanings.sent3: The misplaced keys were retrievable after a thorough search.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a retrievable quality, always willing to help others.
meanings.sent5: The recipe was retrievable online, making cooking easier for everyone.
